title: 4 weeks free on this super spacious studio! Check it out today!
posting_body: ['Brand New Apartments on Capitol Hill', 'When Close to Home is Close to Everything', 'At Pivot Apartments, you’re close to everything Seattle has to offer.', 'Wind down at the end of the day or hype up at the start of the night, with modern design and new fixtures, our units are a blank slate for what fuels you.', 'Convenience & Community', 'At Pivot, we know how important community is when you’re finding a home.', 'That’s why we created a relaxing gathering space designed to bring the best of the Northwest to you.', 'You’ll find a firepit, bbq grill, views of the Space Needle, and plenty of seating for you and your friends to catch up.', 'The Neighborhood', 'Pivot is perched along Pine Street at the intersection of downtown Seattle and Capitol Hill.', "It's a mix of energized interiors and equally relaxing spaces with views for days, a stunning rooftop, and a fitness room.", "There's a floorplan for every type of need including studios, open 1 bedrooms, and 1 and 2 bedroom options.", "From parking to package lockers, it's the perfect blend of convenience and special touches.", "And bonus, Capitol Hill's popular bars and restaurants are right at your fingertips.", "At Pivot, you'll never have a dull moment.", "Whether you're working downtown or out for a night on the town, you're always a minute or two from home.", 'Contact Us', 'We’d love to answer your questions and help you book a guided tour:', 'All leasing is done online for your convenience.', 'Call us at', 'show contact info', 'Visit', '<URL>', 'Self guided tours are available for select apartments Coming soon!Video call tours are also available over zoom, where we would walk the apartments for you and you would view the unit from the comfort of your laptop or mobile device.', 'Finally we can do in person touring on the property, but we would still need to abide by all social distancing guidelines, which require 6 feet of distance between the guest and agent, and facemasks must be worn during the full duration of the tour.', '*Photos are of sample finishes and layout and may not represent exact unit.', 'Keywords: Amazon, Microsoft, Bill Gates, UW, University of Washington, Fred Hutch, SCCA, South Lake Union, Queen Anne, Capitol Hill, Belltown, Ballard, Fremont, Wallingford, Westlake, Green Lake, Magnolia, Space Needle, Downtown, Uptown, Connector, Seattle Center, Key Arena, Boeing, New, Luxury, Loft, Interbay, Westlake, Eastlake, Garbage Disposal, Dishwasher, AC, Light Rail, Natural Light, Bus, Rapid Ride, Relocation, Short Term, Long Term, Walk, Bike, Bicycle, Parking']
